document.full_text: a group of u.s. army soldiers accused of killing unarmed afghan civilians in cold blood did not act clandestinely as the pentagon has implied but in plain view of their combat unit, rolling stone magazine reported on monday.
document.title: soldiers in afghan killings operated openly: report
